trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX125_03713_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee appears even more restless than usual, which should be cause for no small amount of alarm.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX125_03713_TODO_00<tab>Defeat the Nu Mou porxienappers in Sextuplet Shallow.

TEXT_BANPIX125_03713_UINNEE_000_000<tab>Well, favorite mortal, we <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> be frolicking with porxies in dreams right now. But nooo! Those awful, nasty lawless ones just had to go and make off with the one I ordered from Pla Enni, so both I <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> the dreams are...porxieless!
TEXT_BANPIX125_03713_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Ugh! Ugh, I say! Oooh, when I get my hands on those porxienappers...
TEXT_BANPIX125_03713_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Wait! I don't need to get my hands on them! Because we have your much larger hands! Good, good. Go and punch a porxienapper in the face for me, mortal!
TEXT_BANPIX125_03713_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The porxie is considerably calmed by your ministrations. After sparing you an affectionate snort, it turns toward Lydha Lran.
TEXT_BANPIX125_03713_UINNEE_000_010<tab>Safe and sound! And round! And cute! Exactly what I was hoping for! I can spin the loveliest of dreams with a porxie so charming...

TEXT_BANPIX125_03713_UINNEE_000_011<tab><sigh> But first I suppose I should inform the Nu Mou in Pla Enni that it arrived safely after all. They were so very <var 1A 02 /var>anxious<var 1A 01 /var> about it. Some fae really need to learn to calm down, if you ask me...
